notifier_path.title: notifier_path
notifier_path.description: The path of the application sending the notifications. Currently only terminal-notifier & Jamf Pro's Management Action have been tested. If this is defined within jamJAR preferences but is missing, then no notifications are sent when a user is logged in. The only notifications will be from Munki status over the loginwindow. Defaults to Management Action.

notifier_sender_id.title: notifier_sender_id
notifier_sender_id.description: The bundle ID of the application that sent the notification, this is only used for terminal-notifier, but seems that Jamf Pro's Management Action ignores this if sent. If this preference is not configured, com.jamfsoftware.selfservice is used.

notifier_msg_nopending.title: notifier_msg_nopending
notifier_msg_nopending.description: The notification text to display when all pending updates have been installed.

notifier_msg_installed.title: notifier_msg_installed
notifier_msg_installed.description: The notification text to display when an item is installed, this requires 2 string placeholders (%s). These are then passed the following: Item Name (i.e. Google Chrome). Item Version (i.e. 56.0.2924.87). %s %s has been installed

notifier_msg_title.title: notifier_msg_title
notifier_msg_title.description: The notification texts title. Defaults to jamJAR

notifier_msg_uptodate.title: notifier_msg_uptodate
notifier_msg_uptodate.description: The notification text to display when a jamJAR policy is initiated via Self Service & the title attempted to install is up-to-date. This requires 1 string placeholders (%s), which defaults to Item Name (i.e. Google Chrome). Latest version of %s is installed.

no_msg_category.title: no_msg_category
no_msg_category.description: Titles installed by jamJAR with the category defined within this key will not post a notification.

log_file_dir.title: log_file_dir
log_file_dir.description: This is the directory in which the jamJAR.log is created, this is created via the jamJAR postflight after every run. The log rotates at midnight & appends the date to the old file.

notifier_msg_pending.title: notifier_msg_pending
notifier_msg_pending.description: The notification text to display when there are updates pending. Currently blocking apps or apps requiring a restart action will all trigger this notification.
